item.title: Deploying Infrastructure on Proxmox with Ansible
item.description: I’ve broken down my HomeLab, and I’m rebuilding it in Ansible for deployment on a Proxmox cluster. Configure Proxmox for ansible I’ve been working off morph027’s workflow for a first successful run. He uses the ansible plugin proxmox_kvm, and I’m using proxmox (for containers). Infrastructure Short and sweet: [proxmox] gold silver bronze Setup script To get my blood pumping, I wrote a playbook to configure the three nodes: # install_pip.yml --- - name: 'prep proxmox hosts for automation' hosts: 'proxmox' gather_facts: false vars: packages: - 'python-pip' - 'python-dev' - 'build-essential' tasks: - name: 'install python-apt so native apt plugins work' package: name: 'python-apt' state: 'present' - name: 'switch to community repos' apt_repository: repo: 'deb https://enterprise.
